RISK_ASSESSMENT.deal_risk_explanation: The deal shows strong engagement with timely responses and no major blockers.

RISK_ASSESSMENT.budget_risk_explanation: No budget concerns have been raised, and the proposal aligns with expectations.

event.event_description: Bruce sent the formal proposal for Cloud Sync Expansion.
James raised a question about deferring onboarding costs.
Draft contracts to be prepared and implementation prep to kick off.

AI_GENERATED_SUMMARY: The sales rep, Bruce Wayne, sent a proposal for Cloud Sync Expansion to prospect James Smith. James raised a minor objection regarding deferring onboarding costs, which Bruce quickly accommodated by updating and resending the proposal. Following James's approval, Bruce confirmed the revised terms and committed to preparing draft contracts and initiating implementation prep, indicating strong progress towards closing the deal.

Next_Steps: Follow up with James next week
RECOMMENDATIONS.Escalation_Triggers: If there are no responses by the expected close date.
RECOMMENDATIONS.Deal_Acceleration_Tactics: Offer additional incentives for early contract signing.

Email_Draft.subject: Follow-Up on Proposal and Next Steps
Email_Draft.body:
Hi James,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to follow up on the revised proposal I sent over. Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with. Looking forward to your feedback!

Best,
Bruce

AI_GENERATED_FOLLOW_UP.Slack_Message: Hi James, just checking in to see if you had any further thoughts on the proposal!
